meaningMnemonic: A degree of <kanji>mastering</kanji> equal to a <kanji>samurai</kanji> is required for a <vocabulary>master's degree</vocabulary>. You'll have to master your chosen skill to the level of a samurai in order to obtain such a degree… Sounds tough.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
